resources.string: View BeauTyXT\'s source code on the GitHub website in your web browser
View BeauTyXT\'s privacy policy in app
View open source licenses of code that BeauTyXT uses in app
Replaces background with pitch black background when dark theme is on
Open BeauTyXT\'s website in your web browser
Review BeauTyXT\'s privacy policy and license (scroll down)

BeauTyXT privacy policy

This app does not use any sensitive permissions, makes no internet connections, and does not store any data in itself other than preferences. This app uses the Android Storage Access Framework (SAF) to interact with files you choose to access, which can be stored in and exported to various locations of your choice. You are responsible for where you choose to store and export your files to. This app does not access, collect, or transmit data from these locations beyond these purposes.

BeauTyXT's privacy policy may be updated from time to time.

Last updated: July 15, 2023.

By checking the checkbox and continuing, you agree to BeauTyXT\'s privacy policy and license, which are shown above.
Render %1$s files on the bottom side of the screen
Shows a button when a markdown file is open which will toggle a fullscreen view of the rendered markdown preview.\nExperimental because it has a few issues.

Shows Any file type option in the open an existing file dialog.\nWARNING PLEASE READ OR RISK LOSING DATA: Do NOT edit files that have binary content in them or else you will risk corruption! Some examples of such files are pdf\'s, odt\'s, and more.
Plain Text and Markdown Rust Library Credits

Adds an export option for %1$s files to export to %2$s.\nNot all Markdown is supported for conversion yet, BeauTyXT will crash when trying to export a %1$s file using unsupported functionality.\nCurrently only Heading, Break, Emphasis, Strong, and alignment with
text here
(center, left, right) are supported.
Are you really sure you want to do this?\nDeleted files are irrecoverable (gone forever!)
%1$s (Create a new folder from the menu and give access to it)
Edit another file in the Typst project
Create and edit another file in the Typst project
Show warnings and errors below the %1$s preview
Auto update the preview on typing
Refresh the render after each character input (slow for big documents), otherwise you will need to refresh manually
Toggle previewing Typst project in fullscreen
Shows a button when a Typst project is open which will toggle a fullscreen preview of the rendered Typst project.\nExperimental because it has a few issues.
